    Classes in Model.Cards that implement Card
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DealCard
    Implements the Card Interface and it contains all the data needed for a DealCard and the methods to access and transform the data
    class 
    MessageCard
    Implements the Card Interface and it contains all the data needed for a MessageCard and the methods to access and transform the data
    Methods in Model.Cards that return Card
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Card
    CardDeck.getTopCard()
    Transformer: removes the last element and returns it
    Precondition: The deck is not empty
    Postcondition: The card is removed from the deck and is returned
    Methods in Model.Cards with parameters of type Card
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    CardDeck.addCardToBottom​(Card card)
    Transformer: adds a Card as the first element
    Precondition: The deck has not reached maxCapacity and card is not null
    Postcondition: The card is added as the first element of the deck
